alert.note: Alert for Clark; Comanche (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 3:38AM CDT until November 04 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Comanche County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Clark County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 338 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Buffalo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sitka, Protection, Coldwater and Lake Coldwater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
